title: HCL-CSC Partnership
teaser: HCL Technologies, and CSC,  have formed a strategic partnership
teaserText: HCL Technologies, a leading global IT services provider, and CSC, a global leader in next-generation IT services and solutions, have formed a strategic partnership to address the substantial market opportunity created by the need for enterprise clients to modernize their applications and transition to the cloud.

title: CSC Acquired UXC
teaser: CSC Completes UXC Acquisition to Form One of Largest IT Services Companies in the Australia-New Zealand Region
